name: Navigation Bar Control
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        // Listen for changes in the payload
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(payload) {
            // Check if the payload has the property "1"
            if (payload && payload[1] === 'show') {
                // If the payload is 'show', remove the hide CSS
                var existingCss = document.querySelectorAll('style');
                existingCss.forEach(function(styleElement) {
                    if (styleElement.innerHTML.includes("md-toolbar#toolbar")) {
                        styleElement.remove();
                    }
                });
            } else {
                // If the payload is anything else, apply the hide CSS
                var css = `
                    <style>
                        md-toolbar#toolbar {
                            display: none;
                        }
                        md-sidenav#sidenav {
                            display: none;
                        }
                        md-content.md-default-theme {
                            margin-left: 0px !important;
                        }
                    </style>
                `;
                document.head.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', css);
            }
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

name: Prepare WiFi Update
Format SSID List
setup wifi UI
SSID UI Display
Log out Button
format:
<button  class="_md-button-wrap _md" id="logout-button" style="width: 100%; padding: 10px; background-color: #c0392b; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer;">
    Logout
  </button>



<style>
  #logout-button:hover {
    background-color: #d32f2f;
    /* Darker shade on hover */
  }
</style>

<script>
  // Ensure logout button works within the Node-RED environment
  document.getElementById('logout-button').onclick = function() {
    // Clear any session or local storage if needed
    // For example: localStorage.clear();
    
    // Redirect to the login page
    window.location.href = '/ui'; // Adjust this URL to your actual login page
  };
</script>
